attributes.action: Ensure complete protection of political prisoners Jayda Fransen and Paul Golding
attributes.background: Jayda Fransen and Paul Golding the leader and deputy leader of the political party Britain First have been found guilty of religiously aggravated harassment -The people of the UK are outraged at the current and past governments who have allowed the rape and torture of hundreds of thousands of women

rejection.details: Sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
